name: Rural Road Construction Project
description: Construction of 10km rural roads connecting remote villages to the main highway network. This project aims to improve transportation and access to markets for local farmers.

name: School Building Renovation
description: Complete renovation of the government primary school building including roof repair, wall painting, and installation of new windows and doors.

name: Water Pipeline Installation
description: Installation of a 15km water pipeline to provide clean drinking water to 5 villages. Includes construction of storage tanks and distribution points.

name: Community Health Center Construction
description: Building a new 10-room community health center with laboratory facilities and staff quarters to serve the healthcare needs of the region.

name: Agricultural Irrigation System
description: Development of a drip irrigation system for 500 acres of farmland to improve water efficiency and crop yields.

name: Bridge Construction Over River
description: Construction of a 200-meter concrete bridge to connect two districts separated by a river, improving regional connectivity.

name: Solar Power Plant Installation
description: Installation of a 5MW solar power plant with battery storage system to provide electricity to remote areas.

name: Waste Management Facility
description: Construction of a waste processing facility to handle municipal solid waste and produce compost for agricultural use.

name: Digital Literacy Center
description: Establishment of a digital literacy center with 20 computers to provide computer education to rural youth and women.

name: Women's Self-Help Group Center
description: Construction of a community center for women's self-help groups to conduct skill development workshops and meetings.
